intro.text: Good morning, UK! Here's your weather forecast for today, April 1st, 2019.

first_half.text: Starting with the first half of the day, we see a mix of conditions across the UK. Temperatures will range from 5.5°C in Manchester to 11°C in London. Precipitation will be light, with Cardiff seeing the least at 0.002 mm and Belfast experiencing the most at 2.5 mm. Wind speeds will be moderate, with Edinburgh having the strongest winds at 5.5 m/s from the north.

second_half.text: Now, moving into the second half of the day, temperatures will drop slightly, with Manchester at 6°C and London at 7°C. Precipitation will increase, with Manchester seeing the most at 2.8 mm and Cardiff the least at 0.5 mm. Wind speeds will remain moderate, with Belfast having the strongest winds at 4.5 m/s from the east.

outro.text: In summary, expect a cool and breezy day across the UK with varying amounts of precipitation. Stay tuned for more updates throughout the day.

3_days_prediction.text: Over the next 3 days, expect very light rain on Tuesday, with light rain on Wednesday and Thursday. Temperatures will remain cool, around 7°C on Tuesday and Wednesday, dropping slightly to 6°C on Thursday. Winds will be moderate on Tuesday, decreasing on Wednesday and Thursday.
